description.value:
Tinkers are inventive problem-solvers who fix damaged objects and create small mechanisms of surprising utility. From repairing clockwork toys to disarming traps, their ingenuity keeps adventuring partiesâ€”and their equipmentâ€”functioning in the field.

  • Skill Advantage: A tinker has &reference[advantage] on checks involving household items or mechanisms, including but not limited to some &reference[Engineering] checks.

  • Dismantle Object: With 1 minute and an &reference[Engineering] skill check, a tinker can attempt to dismantle a handheld mechanical object [[/check eng 15]]{(DC 15)} or a locked or sealed container or door that would normally require @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.LMnHshpVe3ciVIwF]{Thievesâ€™ Tools}, using the same DC as lockpicking.

  • Repair Object: With 1 hour and an &reference[Engineering] skill check, a tinker can attempt to repair an object no larger than a humanoid's weapon. Tinkers can also remove damage done by spells and monsters (such as rust monsters).

    • An item they created or dismantled [[/check eng 5]]{(DC 5)}.

    • An object they could normally craft [[/check eng 10]]{(DC 10)}.

    • An object normally craftable with a different tool [[/check eng 15]]{(DC 15)}.

    • A magic item [[/check eng 25]]{(DC 25)}. For magic items, you can use an &reference[Arcana] check instead.

  • Craft: A tinker can craft one of the following over a long rest:

    • Ranged Weapons: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.O7abmlrF4raTjnkr]{Pistol}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.IUIwCZtPbwMwB0b1]{Musket}.*

    • Tools: Any tools other than vehicles.

    • Misc: Any small handheld object, including but not limited to: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.U7BeXnyMQCYgHmuC]{Ink Pen}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.awbDqEGrcXCCwsr1]{Lantern}, Flask (x5), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.CVUJhdjmUOMrdTyC]{Grappling Hook}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.6feFbcgaZMorx6j6]{Bear Trap} (x3), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.qMlH5Z7Mf9vD3hac]{Magnifying Glass}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.gQdHSGV1mNemrUFV]{Manacles}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.kdgywrUUKL908VmQ]{Mirror}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.EDcwCf5II2lebxFo]{Padlock}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.9oZldilBfqXhnsum]{Spyglass}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Jl3sEGCd3el0bGdm]{Tinderbox}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.goGB8rvZCnVkwfsA]{Whistle}.

* Firearms come with Firearm Bullets (x20) as needed at no extra cost.
